00035 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00036 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00037 
00038 static int
00039 lolnd_send (lnet_ni_t *ni, void *private, lnet_msg_t *lntmsg)
00040 {
00041         LASSERT (!lntmsg->msg_routing);
00042         LASSERT (!lntmsg->msg_target_is_router);
00043 
00044         return lnet_parse(ni, &lntmsg->msg_hdr, ni->ni_nid, lntmsg, 0);
00045 }
00046 
00047 static int
00048 lolnd_recv (lnet_ni_t *ni, void *private, lnet_msg_t *lntmsg,
00049             int delayed, unsigned int niov,
00050             struct kvec *iov, lnet_kiov_t *kiov,
00051             unsigned int offset, unsigned int mlen, unsigned int rlen)
00052 {
00053         lnet_msg_t *sendmsg = private;
00054 
00055         if (lntmsg != NULL) {                   /* not discarding */
00056                 if (sendmsg->msg_iov != NULL) {
00057                         if (iov != NULL)
00058                                 lnet_copy_iov2iov(niov, iov, offset,
00059                                                   sendmsg->msg_niov,
00060                                                   sendmsg->msg_iov,
00061                                                   sendmsg->msg_offset, mlen);
00062                         else
00063                                 lnet_copy_iov2kiov(niov, kiov, offset,
00064                                                    sendmsg->msg_niov,
00065                                                    sendmsg->msg_iov,
00066                                                    sendmsg->msg_offset, mlen);
00067                 } else {
00068                         if (iov != NULL)
00069                                 lnet_copy_kiov2iov(niov, iov, offset,
00070                                                    sendmsg->msg_niov,
00071                                                    sendmsg->msg_kiov,
00072                                                    sendmsg->msg_offset, mlen);
00073                         else
00074                                 lnet_copy_kiov2kiov(niov, kiov, offset,
00075                                                     sendmsg->msg_niov,
00076                                                     sendmsg->msg_kiov,
00077                                                     sendmsg->msg_offset, mlen);
00078                 }
00079 
00080                 lnet_finalize(ni, lntmsg, 0);
00081         }
00082 
00083         lnet_finalize(ni, sendmsg, 0);
00084         return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 static int lolnd_instanced;
00088 
00089 static void
00090 lolnd_shutdown(lnet_ni_t *ni)
00091 {
00092         CDEBUG (D_NET, "shutdown\n");
00093         LASSERT (lolnd_instanced);
00094 
00095         lolnd_instanced = 0;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static int
00099 lolnd_startup (lnet_ni_t *ni)
00100 {
00101         LASSERT (ni->ni_lnd == &the_lolnd);
00102         LASSERT (!lolnd_instanced);
00103         lolnd_instanced = 1;
00104 
00105         return (0);
00106 }
00107 
00108 lnd_t the_lolnd = {
00109         /* .lnd_list       = */ {&the_lolnd.lnd_list, &the_lolnd.lnd_list},
00110         /* .lnd_refcount   = */ 0,
00111         /* .lnd_type       = */ LOLND,
00112         /* .lnd_startup    = */ lolnd_startup,
00113         /* .lnd_shutdown   = */ lolnd_shutdown,
00114         /* .lnt_ctl        = */ NULL,
00115         /* .lnd_send       = */ lolnd_send,
00116         /* .lnd_recv       = */ lolnd_recv,
00117         /* .lnd_eager_recv = */ NULL,
00118         /* .lnd_notify     = */ NULL,
00119         /* .lnd_accept     = */ NULL
00120 };
